Leadership

Great leaders are essential to every organization's success. Yet we're living in a time when executive-level nonprofit turnover is higher than ever. To help you maintain stability and continuity, Orr Group can supply leadership coaching and board development; work with your current staff interim embedded leadership for nearly any role or function.

@@title

Orr Group's Leadership services include:

  • Interim Leadership
  • Executive Coaching
  • Board Recruitment and Development
  • Retreat Facilitation

@@paragraph

1 in 6 executive directors are 60+ years old.
33 percent of executive directors feel somewhat or very burned out.
Half of chief development officers are planning to leave their position.
